message: For some reason, I never really consider saying no.
Noiz is so earnest. I can tell how much he wants it. But more than that...
I want him.
Maybe that desire is even stronger than I know.
I pull away for a moment to lock the door. On my way back, I make sure the curtains are shut.

name: ノイズ
message: "You're so paranoid."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Common sense, man!"

name: ノイズ
message: "I don't really care if anyone sees us."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well I do."
I rejoin Noiz and lean over him like before.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I-I'm still pretty freaked out."

name: ノイズ
message: "Really?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, yeah. I mean, a lot of stuff could happen. I locked the door, but what if someone's standing outside?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Just don't worry about it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I can't just not worry about it."

name: ノイズ
message: "Then stop me."
Noiz wraps his arms around me with a sigh.
And then... he kisses me.
It starts as a light peck, but then he pushes harder, running his tongue along my lips urgently.
I open my mouth to grant him access and he slips his tongue in, stroking the insides of my cheeks and tracing my teeth.
When I hear a clicking against my teeth, I remember that Noiz has a tongue piercing.
That's right. This isn't the first time we've done this...
We went pretty far last time, too... but I never imagined we'd end up like this.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Hngh... Nmph."
I wrap my arms around his neck as we tease each other with our tongues. My hands stroke his back and head.
I can feel my temperature rising. A pleasant numbness is building in my skull.
I've already forgotten my fear of discovery. It doesn't matter anymore.
I gently lean forward, pushing Noiz back onto the pillows, and pull my lips away.
A thin thread of saliva hangs between our lips, swaying at the hot touch of our breath.
Noiz looks up at me curiously.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Hm? What?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You probably shouldn't get up..."

name: ノイズ
message: "You're not suggesting we stop, so.."

name: ノイズ
message: "Lemme guess. You're gonna do all the work?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Well, uh, I guess that's basically what I meant, yeah."

name: ノイズ
message: "...Seriously?"
Noiz's eyes go wide. He must've meant it as a joke.
